Additional specifications, per '''ZyXEL''''s manual, follow... *Dimensions (WxDxH): [[Dimensions::255 mm x 165 mm x 63 mm]] Default settings are per '''ZyXEL''''s manual. :User accounts of '''admin''', '''user''', and '''support''' are noted - all w/ '''1234''' being the default password. :The default SSID may be '''ZyXEL'''. ==Links of Interest== [http://www.zyxel.com/products_services/p_663hn_51.shtml Product page]
